message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.

Hi Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I understand that $12000 is your maximum budget, but I'm still looking to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my original asking price.
